alert.note: Alert for Cass (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 9:11AM CDT until April 05 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Southern Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Cass County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 910 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Genoa to near Ravanna to near Smithland, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Magnolia, Springhill, Stamps, Waldo, Lewisville, McNeil, Fouke, Bradley, Taylor, Emerson, Buckner, Rodessa, Garland, Ida, Willisville, Smithland, McLeod, Genoa and Brightstar. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Texas.
